thread.title: Randy couple filmed having sex next to row of cash machines in broad daylight
thread.title_full: Randy couple filmed having sex next to row of cash machines in broad daylight

author: Gerard Couzens
title: Randy couple filmed having sex next to row of cash machines in broad daylight
text:
News Randy couple filmed having sex next to row of cash machines in broad daylight Witnesses gave up trying to withdraw money from the machines and instead pulled out their mobile phones and recorded video of the shocking scene Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Couple have SEX in broad daylight next to a cashpoint Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A randy couple gave passers-by more than an eyeful when they were spotted having sex next to a bank of cash machines in broad daylight. 
Witnesses gave up trying to withdraw money from the machines and instead pulled out their mobile phones and recorded video of the shocking scene. 
The nearly naked pair didn't appear to be disturbed by the crowd gathered around them as their romp was filmed and eventually posted on social media, where the video went viral . 
The incident is said to have taken place at a cash machine opposite an education office in the Mexican city of Oaxaca. Footage of the pair has gone viral on the internet (Photo: Twitter / Guillermo Perezpena) 
The identities of the couple aren't known, but the video has sparked speculation that the pair were teachers who had taken time out of a strike that was taking place at the time. Read More Brazilian lawyer explains why she dumped high-flying career to become a PROSTITUTE at mum's suggestion 
An onlooker filming the scene could be overheard saying: “Look at what’s happening in Oaxaca! Nice!” 
In recent months a number of videos of couples caught romping in public places have gone viral on the internet. 
On Friday it emerged two police officers in Argentina were facing the sack after mobile phone footage emerged of them having sex in a patrol car whilst ignoring a radio call to attend a robbery. The nearly naked pair didn't appear to be disturbed by the crowd (Photo: Twitter / Guillermo Perezpena) 
The unnamed woman officer can be seen in the video pleasuring her male colleague and pausing as she hears the call to attend the crime scene - before getting back to business as he lifts up his shirt. Read More There's a reason why so many people fantasise about having sex with their stepmums 
Last year a couple were filmed having sex in a busy metro station in Barcelona. 
The bonking pair kept their tops on but threw their trousers to the ground so they could make love on one of the benches normally reserved for passengers waiting for trains to arrive. Like us on Facebook
